name: SLUG SLUG
description:
This is a SLUG SLUG game. To start the game, click on the text "Start" in the game menu. You play as a slug whose cheeseburger was stolen and you need to get it back. You go through the rooms of the dungeon, take the key in the room and the door to another room will open. You have one chance! Watch out for thorns!

"A, D" - move.

"Space" is a jump.

The game was created for Game jam.
